item.title: Sql Injection Vulnerbility in Where Clause Allowing Retrieval of Hidden Data
item.description: in this description it’s saying that there is a SQL vuln in product category filter , to solve this lab we need to perform a SQL injection that causes application to display unreleases products this is the website dashboard since it’s mentioned that there is a vulnerability in product category let’s select the product category and capture the request in burp suite SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = ‘Gifts’ AND released = 1
